Class JournalAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.algem.config.Param
      • net.algem.accounting.JournalAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, GemModel

    public class JournalAccount
extends Param
    Accounting journal. A journal is a param associated with an account.
